definition: incantation/magic spell/curse/malediction/to revile/to put a curse on sb
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: She was swearing for four hours, ” Michnik says.
sentences.chinese: 她賭咒發誓了4個小時，”米奇尼可說。
